QuestData.Title: Wrangling a Wolf
QuestData.Description: This next one will test you to your very limits, commander. The wolf is the most savage beast in all of Draenor.$B$BThe wolves of Nagrand, mounts of the fabled Warsong clan, can rend a man to bits in seconds. They're also faster and more agile than anything you've seen yet.$B$BHere's your lasso. Good luck, and don't get yourself killed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Wolf Lasso on a Young Snarler and follow it until it is tamed.
